item.title: CraigCat Boat Tour from Fernandina Beach
item.description: Plan an outdoor adventure in the waterways of Amelia Island with this small-group boat tour. Meet your guide at a departure point and set out in CraigCat boats, which are like go-carts on water, to explore Fernandina Beach and beyond. Keep an eye out for wildlife such as dolphins, manatees, and shore birds. See local landmarks like Fort Clinch State Park during the tour.

image.alt: CraigCat Boat Tour from Fernandina Beach

item.title: Amelia Island Guided Kayak Tour of Lofton Creek
item.description: Escape the bustle of the city for the morning—and immerse yourself in Florida’s wealth of wildlife—on this family-friendly kayaking tour of Lofton Creek, just north of Jacksonville. Make your own way to the departure point at Fernandina Beach, take part in a brief introduction, and grab your kayak, paddle, and life vest. Then, take to the water, where you can spot wildlife ranging from otters and turtles—even manatees.

image.alt: Amelia Island Guided Kayak Tour of Lofton Creek

item.title: Eight Flags Road Tour
item.description: Discover the rich history of Amelia Island with a small-group sightseeing tour. Set out in an air-conditioned minibus for a guided tour of Amelia Island and learn about different phases of local history from the Timucua Indians to the modern shrimping industry. Hear stories about local historic figures as you get your bearings in Amelia Island.

image.alt: Eight Flags Road Tour

item.title: Electric Bike Tours in Amelia Island
item.description: Two wheels and a thirst for adventure are all you’ll need when you rent a Pedego Electric Bike for a ride around Amelia Island. Join this tour starting at Big Talbot Island State Park and cruise your way through seven miles of natural bliss. The trail is full of stunning scenery and you might see a few of the local wildlife along the ride. A helmet is included with every bike rental as well.

image.alt: Electric Bike Tours in Amelia Island

item.title: Guided Kayak Eco Tour: Real Florida Adventure
item.description: Discover the waterways of Amelia Island with this guided kayaking tour. Meet your certified Master Naturalist guide for a kayaking trek through the wetlands. Set out on a peaceful paddle to see fish, birds, alligators, and more all while learning about the local ecosystem. No prior experience is required and complimentary photos are taken by guides during the tour.

image.alt: Guided Kayak Eco Tour: Real Florida Adventure

item.title: Electric Bike Art and Architecture Guided Tour in Jacksonville
item.description: Tour Jacksonville’s arts and architecture scene thoroughly on this electric bike tour, which lets you cover a ton more ground than if you were on foot, and offers more flexibility than in a car. Plus your guide tells you the best route, starting near Memorial Park, making your way along the St. Johns River and through the Avondale Historic District. Besides art and architecture, keep your eyes peeled for river dolphins, too.

image.alt: Electric Bike Art and Architecture Guided Tour in Jacksonville

item.title: The Escape Game at St. John's Town Center in Jacksonville
item.description: Gather your friends, sharpen your mind, and get ready to escape a fun, themed room in downtown Jacksonville. Head to St. Johns Town Center and choose from one of five unique escape rooms. You’ll have a guide to help you escape from the evil warden in Prison Break or get your report card checked off in Playground. Solve the puzzles and gather clues to escape before the time runs out.

image.alt: The Escape Game at St. John's Town Center in Jacksonville

item.title: Downtown Fernandina Historical Walking Tour
item.description: Learn about the stories behind the streets and homes in Downtown Fernandina with a historical walking tour. Meet your private guide for a stroll that includes streets built before and after the Civil War. Delve into 300 years of the island's history and hear tales about pirates, war, and important local figures. Maximize time in Fernandina with a private tour.

image.alt: Downtown Fernandina Historical Walking Tour

item.title: Self-Guided Kayaking: Real Florida Adventure
item.description: Amelia Island has serene beaches, but there’s also a backwater tributary that offers a glimpse into Old Florida splendor. Minimal water movement makes this a relaxed, low-impact experience for all skill levels. Keep your eyes peeled for the locals, too; mainly, gators, waterfowl, fish, and turtles.

image.alt: Self-Guided Kayaking: Real Florida Adventure

item.title: Kid-Friendly Beach Rides
item.description: This is a one-of-a-kind experience riding an electric skateboard on Amelia Island. Not only do you get a chance to visit our beautiful beaches, but you get to do it all while riding the island in style. We occasionally stop mid ride to find shark teeth near the jetties. We'll finish your experience cruising on the beach while everyone watches. Included in your tour at no additional cost will be 4K pictures and videos taken via Gopro by your tour guide. This allows you to fully enjoy the experience while we capture the moments for you.

image.alt: Kid-Friendly Beach Rides

item.title: 90 Minute Self-Guided Arcimoto FUV Adventure
item.description: Discover Amelia Island in a fun and sustainable way, with a fully electric Arcimoto FUV rental, with space for two people. Explore highlights such as the Amelia Island Lighthouse, Bosque Bellow Cemetery, and Fort Clinch Park at your own pace on a self-guided tour, and enjoy tunes from the Bluetooth sound system along the way.

image.alt: 90 Minute Self-Guided Arcimoto FUV Adventure

item.title: Half-Day City Tour in Downtown Jacksonville
item.description: Explore the history and architecture of Downtown Jacksonville with this tuk-tuk tour. Meet your guide and set out on a half-day tour to see popular local landmarks including the John T. Alsop Jr. Bridge, Veterans Memorial Wall, Jacksonville Veterans Memorial Arena, and Friendship Fountain. Free pick-up from certain hotels is available.

image.alt: Half-Day City Tour in Downtown Jacksonville

item.title: Private Guided Boat Tour up to 6 passengers in Fernandina Beach
item.description: Explore Amelia Island from the water with this guided private boat tour. Make your way to Fernandina Beach to board the boat helmed by a local USCG certified captain. Keep an eye out for wildlife like dolphins and wild horses as you cruise around Amelia Island, Cumberland Island, and Fort Clinch State Park, and learn about the area’s history and wildlife from your guide.

image.alt: Private Guided Boat Tour up to 6 passengers in Fernandina Beach

item.title: Jacksonville Private Boat Tour Daytime or Sunset, up to 6 people
item.description: We provide a personalizable private daytime tour with a maximum of 6 passengers. This guarantees that your tour will never be crowded and allows us to take the time to see all sights, enjoy a sandbar, float in a tube, and more. When you book your tour, we will coordinate the meeting point and customize your tour to a degree. We love families, when little travelers are on board, Captain Dan loves to tell stories for the little ones, creating a fun learning environment for children. We also love to help you celebrate life's special moments from Anniversaries to engagements, baby announcements, and more. Conditions and limitations apply. The Captain has full authority over the trip and reserves the right to shorten or redirect any trip due to inclement weather or any other hazard that may inhibit the tour.

image.alt: Jacksonville Private Boat Tour Daytime or Sunset, up to 6 people

item.title: Lofton Creek Kayaking Trip with Professional Guide
item.description: Lofton Creek is a perfect place to kayak—the water is calm and the area is home to an abundance of wildlife and flora. Avoid the stress of navigating or finding a place to hire equipment, and instead, go on this hassle-free guided tour. Kayaking equipment is included and a guide takes you on a memorable route with commentary about the interesting sights you pass.

image.alt: Lofton Creek Kayaking Trip with Professional Guide

item.title: Jacksonville Residential Architecture & History Tour
item.description: Discover the architecture and history of two neighborhoods in Jacksonville with this tuk-tuk tour. Maximize time with this sightseeing tour that includes the Riverside and Avondale Historic District. Learn about the architectural style that became popular after the 1901 fire in Jacksonville. Complete the tour with a visit to Memorial Park on St. John's River.

image.alt: Jacksonville Residential Architecture & History Tour

item.title: Riverside/5 Points Culinary Tour (Jacksonville)
item.description: If you’re hungry for the best food and wine Jacksonville’s Riverside has to offer, then grab your appetite and slip on a comfortable pair of walking shoes for this unique foodie tour. Corks and Forks is a food and wine pairing tour that’ll introduce you to the tasty side of J-Ville. Sample local cuisine and delicious wine while strolling through the Riverside.

image.alt: Riverside/5 Points Culinary Tour (Jacksonville)

item.title: 20 Minutes Chocolate & Candy Factory Tour in Jacksonville
item.description: Get the scoop on all things Sweet. A candy expert leads each tour on a sweet trip through the company's history. Learn about candy, chocolate, our business, and the features of the one-hundred-year-old candy mansion. Participants will view the different rooms throughout our building and our production facility. After the whimsical tour experience, enjoy a decadent chocolate bar made your way! Choose from over sixteen toppings, and our candy makers will create a bar exactly the way you want.

image.alt: 20 Minutes Chocolate & Candy Factory Tour in Jacksonville

item.title: Florida Backroads E-Bike Tour
item.description: Explore the backroads of Ponte Vedra Beach in Florida with this private e-bike tour. Meet your guide for a half-day cycle in the Guana Tolomato Matanzas National Estuarine Reserve and keep an eye out for wildlife including dolphins, a rich variety of bird species, and even alligators. Go off-the-beaten-path with this cycling tour that includes the assistance of battery power in the e-bikes.

image.alt: Florida Backroads E-Bike Tour

item.title: Big Talbot Island Self Guided Tour with Smart Helmets
item.description: Northeastern Florida is home to multiple state parks full of unique beaches. Discover Big Talbot Island State Park and Amelia Island State Park at your own pace when you rent a Pedego Electric Bike. You’ll explore Amelia Island on this eco-friendly ride, complete with smart helmets that let you communicate with riders in your group. The easy-to-follow trail is explained at the rental shop so you can choose which portions of the route to follow.

image.alt: Big Talbot Island Self Guided Tour with Smart Helmets

item.title: Amelia Island Area Kayak Rental on Lofton Creek with Adventures Up The Creek
item.description: Explore Lofton Creek at your leisure with this half-day kayak rental in Amelia Island. Get all the equipment you need for an independent adventure and set out paddling at your own pace in peaceful Lofton Creek. Keep an eye out for wildlife including a wide variety of shore birds. This excursion is a good fit for beginners, as Lofton Creek is known for being sheltered from the wind.

image.alt: Amelia Island Area Kayak Rental on Lofton Creek with Adventures Up The Creek

item.title: Stumpy's Axe Throwing Activity from Jacksonville
item.description: Experience the thrill of landing the bullseye! In your group's private lounge area, guests are trained to success throw an axe to the wooden targets in the fenced in throwing pit. When not throwing, enjoy a comfortable rustic environment to eat, drink and connect with friends. In addition to axe throwing, guests can utilize the giant games (Stumpuck, giant timbers, Connect 4, and more!) and board games.

image.alt: Stumpy's Axe Throwing Activity from Jacksonville

item.title: Jacksonville Ghosts and Ghouls Tour By US Ghost Adventures
item.description: Explore a spookier side of Jacksonville with a guide to tell you all about the city’s darker history on this group ghost tour. See hotels, old speakeasies, museums, and more as you hear stories about the city’s (allegedly) haunted past. Navigate the city safely in the dark thanks to your guide and group.

image.alt: Jacksonville Ghosts and Ghouls Tour By US Ghost Adventures

item.title: Guided Arcimoto FUV Tour on Amelia Island
item.description: Cruise on Amelia Island in our fully electric Arcimoto FUV’s. Enjoy this guided tour of scenic views of the island and the outdoors as we take you on an adventure like no other. Not only do you get to drive the Arcimotos, but you also will learn unique and cool history at each of the stops on this tour.

image.alt: Guided Arcimoto FUV Tour on Amelia Island
